channel.title: Posts on Chenyang‘s page
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Chenyang‘s page

item.title: AI Law Final Review Note
item.description: Introduction I made this material as a final review note for QMUL Module EBU5107: AI Law. It covers key points and some most difficult parts from Teaching Block3(AI and Intellectual Property) and Block4(AI and Privacy&Security). Note Some parts of material are adapted from the EBU5017 lecture slides and is intended for personal study and educational use only. Download Block3 Note.pdf

item.title: MLnote1:What does it mean to sample from a distribution?
My paper for CUMCM2024
item.description: I participated in the 2024 China Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling(CUMCM) and won the national second prize. Our team’s winning paper is attached here for reference. If you want to know more about this paper and Mathematicl Modeling, you can visit the website of Haitong Lan(https://noisierier.github.io/p/my-mathematical-modeling/), one of my teammates.

item.title: Digital Circuit Design Final Revision Tutorial
item.description: Introduction I made this material as a final review note for QMUL Module EBU4202: Digital Circuit Design. It covers key points and some most difficult parts from Teaching Block1——Block3. Block4 is not included due to time limit. Tutorial I hosted and ran the tutorial on June 11, 2024 from 7:30 PM to 9:30 PM to help BUPT-QMUL students review the course Digital Circuit Design. The tutorial was for students from two majors, which are Intelligence Science and Technology and Electronic Information Engineering.
